      • addToInterpreter

        public void addToInterpreter(Interpreter i)
        Adds this user definition to the grammar of an existing interpreter
        Parameters:
        i - The interpreter to add the definition to

      • createPattern

        protected String createPattern()
        Creates a new grammar case that matches the pattern declared for this definition. For example, given the expression: 
         WHEN @P IS A XYZ: THE COUNT OF @P IS THE ABC ...
        This would create the following case, appended to the cases of non-terminal symbol ABC: 
         THE COUNT OF <XYZ>
        Returns:
        A string containing the new grammar case

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
